meta_description: Explore 12 galleries of American Indian art, contemporary and historic, and a world-class museum shop and café. Visit today!
hours_text:
##  Plan Your Visit 

##  Plan Your Visit 

Plan your visit with museum hours, directions, parking info, things to do, and what to expect during your visit. 

**Open 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.**  
Monday through Sunday  

2301 N Central Ave  
Phoenix, AZ 85004  

Artboard

[Parking Map](http://web.archive.org/web/20251124025820/https://heard.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/HeardMuseum_Parking-Map_Final_.pdf)

[Accessibility Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20251124025820/https://heard.org/accessibility/)

  * []( "Home")
  *   * Plan Your Visit 

Prepare to explore the stories of American Indian artists through world-class exhibitions, cultural events, and family activities. Then round out your day with award-winning dining at the Courtyard Café and browse authentic Indigenous art at the beautifully renovated Museum Shop. 

###  Admission 

Our easy-to-use online ticketing system allows you to select a date and purchase your tickets in advance. With just a few quick clicks, reserve your tickets at anytime from anywhere. View in-person discounts [_here._](http://web.archive.org/web/20251124025820/https://heard.org/tickets/#in-person-discounts)

[Buy Tickets Online](http://web.archive.org/web/20251124025820/https://heard.ticketapp.org/portal/product/1?_gl=1*1stts5c*_gcl_aw*R0NMLjE3NDE4ODU3MTIuQ2owS0NRandoTXEtQmhDRkFSSXNBR3ZvMEtjeHFZR2p1TkthVlZXQ1pQVVhEcVZvUFlGTk5XMEp2UGhGb2VUMFBpU2VPZVVKN19wYXBFNGFBcTZYRUFMd193Y0I.*_gcl_au*MTQ5OTAwNTc1MS4xNzM5NDY4ODQy*_ga*ODQ2NzI3NTM3LjE3Mzk0Njg4ND...

collections_text:
##  Experience 

#  Indigenous Creativity 

[Buy tickets](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116045023/https://heard.ticketapp.org/portal/product/1)

[View hours and directions](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116045023/https://heard.org/visit/plan-your-visit/)

##  WELCOME TO THE HEARD MUSEUM 

Discover the rich and vibrant world of American Indian art, from traditional artworks to contemporary creations, live events and a world-class museum shop and café. 

###  Current Exhibitions 

  * #### [ October Art: The Collection of Delores Browne Abelson  Through October 26, 2026  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116045023/https://heard.org/exhibition/october-art/)
  * #### [ Hoop Dance!  Through January 18, 2026  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116045023/https://heard.org/exhibition/hoop-dance/)
  * #### [ Heart of the Community: Baskets from the Basha Family Collection of American Indian Art  Through March 8, 2026  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116045023/https://heard.org/exhibition/heart-of-the-community/)
  * #### [ Adorned with Memory: Jewelry from the Basha Family Collection of American Indian Art  Through March 8, 2026  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116045023/https://heard.org/exhibition/adorned-with-memory/)
  * #### [ American Indian Veterans National Memorial  ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260116045023/https://heard.org/exhibition/veterans-national-memorial/)
  * #### [ The Third Dimension: Sculptural Stories in Stone and Bronze  ](http://web.archive.org/web/202...
